duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs technical procedures and maintains knowledge of all procedures and protocols.
Collects and processes specimens on patients of all ages as required.
Fulfills test requests and charts results on patients with many different clinical conditions and all age ranges.
Assists in the clerical duties of the department and performs required function verification of equipment.
Communicates with other allied health care professionals and patients according to job requirements.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or better, Phlebotomy certification preferred
